amendment.description: To authorize assistance for renewable energy projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4688 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4688 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S8136; text: CR S8136) To authorize assistance for renewable energy projects.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4688 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Lugar.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4688 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
